Summary Note:
The RM is a close family friend of Freja Idun Østergaard's parents, having known her since birth. This deep-rooted connection has facilitated a strong and trustworthy professional relationship.
Freja Idun Østergaard is a 58 year old and comes from Denmark.
Julius Baer's personalized approach and dedication to client success were key factors in her decision to join.
Family Background: Freja Idun Østergaard has been happily married to Thomsen since 1992. They do not have any children.
Education Background:
Freja received her secondary school diploma from Faaborg Gymnasium in 1985.
Freja finished her studies at The Danish National School of Theatre and Contemporary Dance in 1989.
Occupation History:
Freja Idun Østergaard is a 58 year old Publisher from Denmark.
At JP/Politikens Hus A/S, Freja Idun Østergaard held the position of Journalist from 1990 to 1995, developing essential skills in the field.
After gaining experience, she took on the role of Editor at JP/Politikens Hus A/S in 1995, further expanding her skill set.
At Berlingske Media A/S, she worked as a Publisher from 1999 till now, focusing on strategic initiatives and team collaboration.
Wealth Summary:
She managed to save approximately 6630000 DKK from her earnings at all companies.
She has house located in Helsingør, worth 1432000 DKK.

In addition to her primary residence, she owns villa in Roskilde worth 2380000 DKK.

On top of that she inherited a beautiful flat in Roskilde, which could be used as a weekend getaway. It is valued at 1000000 DKK.
She inherited a significant sum of 8730000 DKK from her father, a respected Venture Capitalist, in 2005, which she has wisely invested.
Client Summary: The RM knows the client very well and is a good friend of the entire family.
